## Source: ossf-package-analysis (69bdf61be1b4579f5016adcacef468a263b798b77b87d354e90900d4cb4474b8)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'tucan-x' @ 0.0.2 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:
- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
